entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then periods of drizzle beginning before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
